trait.name: Mounted Defense
entries: While mounted, the rider can force an attack that targets its mount to target the rider instead.

trait.name: Mounted Evasion
entries: While mounted, if the rider's mount is subject to an effect that allows it to make a Dexterity saving throw to take only half damage, it instead takes no damage if it succeeds on the saving throw, and only half damage if it fails.
